Insurance

Class ClientDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • Insurance.ClientDetails

  • public class ClientDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    Client details class the holds all the information attached to each client Ashley Moore - 21/02/2013
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientDetails(java.lang.String clientID, Name clientFullName, Address clientFullAddress, PolicyList clientPolicies)
      Default client details constructor which takes 4 parameters, an address name and policy objects along with an client ID string.
